item.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity extends ITDR capabilities to Okta identities
item.description: Identities are the organization’s new security perimeter and are a prime target for cyber-criminals. However, with today’s ever-evolving digital landscape, security leaders often wrestle with a tapestry of different identity solutions spanning multiple environments and vendors, making identity protection more challenging than ever.
